name: Wedding
description: Celebrate your special day with a beautiful wedding ceremony and reception. This package includes an elegant venue, floral decorations, gourmet catering, and a live band and DJ for entertainment. Contact us at wedding@example.com for inquiries. Price: $5000
discount: Book before June 30, 2023, and receive a 10% discount.

name: Birthday Party
description: Throw a memorable birthday bash for yourself or a loved one. This package includes an exclusive use of the City Park Pavilion, themed decorations, a delicious chocolate cake, and entertainment by a magician and clown. Contact us at birthday@example.com for inquiries. Price: $800
discount: Book for a weekday celebration and receive a 10% discount.

name: Anniversary Celebration
description: Honor the years of love and commitment with an elegant anniversary party. This package includes a luxurious hotel ballroom, red and gold decorations, and a live band for dancing. Contact us at anniversary@example.com for inquiries. Price: $1200
discount: Book in advance and receive a complimentary bottle of champagne.

name: Retirement Party
description: Bid farewell to a colleague with a retirement party full of joy and memories. This package includes an office conference room and an option for a farewell gift. Contact us at retirement@example.com for inquiries. Price: $600
discount: Enjoy a 15% discount for group bookings from your office.

name: Engagement Party
description: Celebrate the beginning of a beautiful journey with a romantic engagement party. This package includes a rooftop lounge venue, a rustic chic theme, and a professional engagement photoshoot. Contact us at engagement@example.com for inquiries. Price: $900
discount: Book before July 31, 2023, and receive a complimentary engagement photo album.

name: Baby Shower
description: Welcome the arrival of a new baby with a heartwarming baby shower. This package includes a community center venue, a gender-neutral theme, and an Amazon Baby Registry. Contact us at babyshower@example.com for inquiries. Price: $500
discount: Receive a 10% discount when booking a baby photography session with our partner photographer.
